sent.orig: No, I can't. Mama gives me a shove.
sent.trans: 不行，我得过去。妈妈轻轻推了我一把。

sent.orig: China will shove Germany off its pedestal as the world's biggest exporter.
sent.trans: 中国将取代德国成为世界上最大的出口国。

sent.orig: The crowd was very thick,but we managed to shove though.
sent.trans: 人群非常拥挤，但我们还是挤过去了。

sent.orig: He pushed the boat off with a shove of the pole.
sent.trans: 他用篙一点就把船撑开了。

sent.orig: Take it easy, don't push and shove.
sent.trans: 大家慢慢走，别推推搡搡的。
